name: A Snowman's Journey Demo
description:
A snowmans journey is an upcoming adventure puzzle game, you are set on a journey to save your fellow snowmen, defeating there evil side while doing puzzles, this is a prototype so it will be buggy !, please take time to fill in our form to help us with the development of the game
